It is native to arid and semi-arid regions of North America, particularly the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. The plants are shrubs or small trees that typically have smooth, grayish bark and simple, alternate leaves. Warczewitzia species are adapted to harsh environments, with deep root systems and drought-resistant characteristics.
